metadata.name: Enable BPF Kprobes Tracing
metadata.comment: Detects common command used to enable bpf kprobes tracing

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('echo 1 >')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/sys/kernel/debug/tracing/events/kprobes/')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/myprobe/enable')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/myretprobe/enable'))))

output.summary: Detects common command used to enable bpf kprobes tracing
